name: Add a channel
description: Adds a new messaging channel, only admins are able to register new channels. It will use the getConversations endpoint to fetch conversations, participants and messages afterward. To use the endpoint, you need to have **Messengers integration** OAuth scope enabled and the Messaging manifest ready for the [Messaging app extension](https://pipedrive.readme.io/docs/messaging-app-extension).
descriptionHtml: Adds a new messaging channel, only admins are able to register new channels. It will use the getConversations endpoint to fetch conversations, participants and messages afterward. To use the endpoint, you need to have Messengers integration OAuth scope enabled and the Messaging manifest ready for the [Messaging app extension](https://pipedrive.readme.io/docs/messaging-app-extension).
